Title: Tennis doubles livescore (Silverlight)
Description:
This project plans to create a Silverlight application for Desktop and later for Windows Phone, to provide a Livescore capabilities for amateur tennis-doubles.

The application will be developed, with MEF and MVVMLight technologies in C#.
HomeWiki:
DLiveScore
Tennis livescore application for doubles

This application planning to support amateur tennis players to provide LiveScore for doubles.

The application will be available as Silverlight application for desktop and for Windows Phone also.

The application do not use any database, the data will be stored in xml files.

The application actually in design phase, the first version planned before and of this year.

Development tools and methods:

* Visual Studio 2010
* C#
* Silverlight 4
* MEF
* MVVMLight
